topic.title: Discord Server for computer science community chat
topic.text:
There is a computer science community discord for Evergreen students, including alums, here
https://discord.gg/9evh6Ztqv4

It's an additional space to meet friends, connect with each other to talk about DSA or work together on projects, talk to others on the coding path, and especially meet those who have already graduated and applied for jobs.

You can also use it to share your screen, like Zoom, to pair program together.

Thanks Jeff for bringing it to our attention.
